about_the_game:
You play as a seductive and powerful female bioweapon, feared by a sentient city and wanted by four factions. How she responds is up to you, as you discover the secrets of Night Light City. Immerse yourself into a cyberpunk 2D cinematic metroidvaina and beat 'em up hybrid.

This is a demo build of the game. Player's abilities are limited in this version and visuals may or may not represent the final product. Some features are currently under development and may not represent the final game. This game does NOT fully save. Other than that, we really hope you enjoy it so far!

content_descriptors.notes: This demo has some violence and some mild language.
